name: Arcade Fly
description:
Arcade fly is a classic super action left or right tap controls game. fly through the sky full of challenging obstacles and enemies. best new Arcade style challenging game.
Pick up Diamonds to unlock new ships and stages.

-go as long as you can
- Arcade action
- Unique left right tap gameplay
- Unlockable ships for different play styles
- full rockstar and fun game
- In-app purchase to remove those ads
